originalText.text: Dr. Harvey was running behind schedule and I was a bit miffed.  However he was well worth the wait.  He gave me a suggestion that no doctor (I have seen a few), ever had and I felt a noticeable relief.  I am confident that my health is in great hands.  Dr. Harvey is very thorough and asks the right questions.  I have taken tests and await the follow up.  I urge you to schedule an appointment with Dr. Harvey he will not disappoint.

originalText.text: I am enormously grateful to Dr. Harvey for getting me in immediately to see him due to a troubling x-ray (despite his busy schedule). He got me a CT scan the same day and was able to give me clarification on my condition the following day. He’s a doctor I’ll happily wait to see, if that’s what it takes. I highly recommend him!

originalText.text: Dr Harvey is a very thorough and knowledgeable doctor. After seeing other doctors, he was the only one that diagnosed me correctly.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Harvey for over 15yrs and he is very good in treating my pulmonary conditions. He explains everything I need yo do to maintain My condition in control. He is a wonderful pulmonary doctor that cares for all his patients. He spends quality time with each patient and makes sure you understand your condition and the plan that he going to take to make sure you are okay. I recommend Dr. Harvey for anyone that needs a qualified pulmonary doctor for their care 100%

originalText.text: I've been a patient of Dr. Harvey for 3 yrs. As long as he is practicing I will be a patient . I love that I am able to schedule my visits in a timely mannar and my visits are never rushed. My asthma is controlled and I am able to enjoy exercising, laughing and walking without worrying of having an episode. Thanks to my treatment plan I was able to take back my life.
